definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
Yunnan province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[dian1] or 雲|云, capital Kunming 昆明
Yunnan Province in southwest China, bordering on Vietnam, Laos and Myanmar, abbr. 滇[Dian1] or 雲|云[Yun2], capital Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2]
to gather (in a crowd)/to converge/to swarm
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
Miyun town and county in Beijing
Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
Chen Yunlin (1941-), chairman of PRC Association for Relations Across the Taiwan Straits (ARATS) 海峽兩岸關係協會|海峡两岸关系协会[Hai3 xia2 Liang3 an4 Guan1 xi5 Xie2 hui4] (2008-2013)

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡曉雲加入擔任業務羣總監，還有一些新成員加盟。

sentences.english: Thy Lord knows best, and He has the clouds and the sun at His disposal. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 你的主無所不知，雲和太陽，都受他的使喚與調節。

sentences.english: But his wife Cao Jingyun was opposed.
sentences.chinese: 但他的妻子曹靜雲卻反對這麼做。

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至週二，冰島火山仍在噴發，但火山灰雲有所降低。

sentences.english: The sun came forth from behind the clouds.
Inspite of a small set of challenges, cloud provides a powerful platform for testing.
sentences.chinese: 儘管有一些問題，雲提供了測試的強大平臺。

sentences.english: The azure sky appeared to be so near and the clouds cast their shadows on the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 天很藍，感覺很近，雲在山上落下影子。

sentences.english: But there are trade-offs, and cloud computing is not without its warts.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有得必有失，雲計算並非沒有缺點。

sentences.english: If did not have the cloud, the sky can be lonely?
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有了雲，天空會不會寂寞？

sentences.english: Clouds turn red when the sun says good-bye to her;
sentences.chinese: 到了太陽和它們說再見的時候，雲就變成了紅色。

sentences.english: The sky is getting very cloudy.
I like Li Xiaoyun's songs very much.
sentences.chinese: 說實在的，我很喜歡李霄雲的歌。

sentences.english: In this speech, Dean Ching-yun Chuang promotes the importance of happiness.
sentences.chinese: 本講座我們邀請莊景雲主任來推廣快樂的重要性。

sentences.english: Surface editing is indispensable in point-based data treatment.
sentences.chinese: 曲面編輯是點雲處理不可缺少的研究內容。

sentences.english: Microsoft announced a Windows Cloud OS.
sentences.chinese: 微軟公佈了其雲計算操作系統。

sentences.english: The cloud, floating around, like an old man wander the whole world.
sentences.chinese: 雲，飄來飄去，就像一位老人云遊四海。

definition: pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
